title: Welcome to the Grid
subtitle: Intro
body: This screen uses the same TetrisGridCore, but each module is a card instead of an image.

title: Performance First
subtitle: Web mobile criteria
body: All layout decisions are done with light JS math. No heavy DOM thrashing, no per-scroll layout.

title: CSV or JSON Driven
subtitle: Data model
body: Modules can come from CSV or JSON. Each module defines its span and content, the layout engine does the rest.

title: Span 2 Hero Card
subtitle: Module weight
body: Cards with span=2 get more visual emphasis. The core clamps spans to the current column count so it works on every device.

title: Future: Bands & Centered Blocks
subtitle: Roadmap
body: Next step is band-aware layout: pinned search bars, centered modules, and more complex page sections.
